data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kawasaki.
In the minute 1, Kawasaki have a goal kick.
Throw-in Shonan.
Reo Hatate of Kawasaki gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 3, Goal kick for Shonan at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Masaaki Iemoto awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Kawasaki goal kick.
In the minute 5, Kawasaki are whistled for offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Shonan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kawasaki's half?
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Shonan.
Masaaki Iemoto awards Kawasaki a goal kick.
Shonan's Hiroto Nakagawa is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 9, Hidemasa Morita (Kawasaki) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Kawasaki's Yu Kobayashi attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Shonan goal kick.
In the minute 11, Kawasaki are pushing forward but Miki Yamane's finish is wide of the goal.
Shonan have a goal kick.
Kawasaki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 11, Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kawasaki's half?
In Kawasaki, Yu Kobayashi of Kawasaki is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in for Kawasaki at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Kawasaki in their own half.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Iemoto.
In Kawasaki Kawasaki drive forward through Hokuto Shimoda. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 17, Yu Kobayashi of Kawasaki smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Kawasaki push forward at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium and Hidemasa Morita gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Shonan defence.
In the minute 19, Ball safe as Shonan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kawasaki are coming forward and Yu Kobayashi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kawasaki.
In the minute 21, Kawasaki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Masaaki Iemoto blows against Kawasaki's Akihiro Ienaga for offside.
In Kawasaki, Yu Kobayashi (Kawasaki) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 25, Kawasaki drive upfield and Akihiro Ienaga gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Shonan defender.
Kawasaki's Hokuto Shimoda gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Shonan defender.
Yu Kobayashi for Kawasaki drives towards goal at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 30, Yu Kobayashi gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kawasaki.
Free kick for Kawasaki in the half of Shonan.
Throw-in for Shonan close to the penalty box.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Kawasaki in their own half.
Kawasaki to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
Ball safe as Shonan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 37, Shonan drive forward but Yuto Iwasaki is judged offside.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Kawasaki's Hidemasa Morita misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 39, Goal kick for Shonan at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Masaaki Iemoto awards Kawasaki a goal kick.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Iemoto.
In the minute 44, Yu Kobayashi (Kawasaki) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Masaaki Iemoto awards Shonan a goal kick.
Masaaki Iemoto signals a free kick to Shonan.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half has come to a close in Kawasaki.
The second-half is underway in Kawasaki.
Reo Hatate for Kawasaki gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 46, Shonan have a goal kick.
In the minute 46, Tarik Elyounoussi is replacing Hiroto Nakagawa for the away team.
The away team replace Takuya Okamoto with Shota Kobayashi.
Ball goes out of play for a Kawasaki goal kick.
In Kawasaki Shonan attack through Toichi Suzuki. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 48, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kawasaki.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Hidemasa Morita (Kawasaki) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 50, Masaaki Iemoto signals a Kawasaki throw-in in Shonan's half.
Kawasaki's Yasuto Wakizaka breaks free at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Shonan at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
In the minute 54, Hidemasa Morita (Kawasaki) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
At Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium, Kawasaki are penalized for being offside.
Kawasaki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 55, Shonan to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
Throw-in for Kawasaki at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Kawasaki drives forward and Yu Kobayashi gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 57, Goal! Tarik Elyounoussi gives Shonan a 0-1 lead.
Shota Kobayashi with an assist there.
Kawasaki make their second substitution with Kaoru Mitoma replacing Reo Hatate.
In the minute 60, The home team have replaced Yasuto Wakizaka with Ryota Ohshima. This is the first substitution made today by Toru Oniki.
Bin Ukishima is making the team's third substitution at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium with Naoki Ishihara replacing Yuto Iwasaki.
Shonan have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Iemoto.
In the minute 61, Miki Yamane levels the score at 1-1.
That's a fine assist from Ryota Ohshima.
Shonan have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Iemoto.
In the minute 65, Masaaki Iemoto signals a free kick to Kawasaki in their own half.
Taisei Miyashiro is on a sub for Yu Kobayashi for Kawasaki.
Leandro Damiao is on a sub for Akihiro Ienaga for Kawasaki.
In the minute 67, Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Kawasaki push upfield and Leandro Damiao gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Shonan defence.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 69, Bin Ukishima (Shonan) is making a fourth substitution, with Akito Fukuta replacing Temma Matsuda.
Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Shonan.
In the minute 71, Throw-in Shonan.
Masaaki Iemoto signals a Kawasaki throw-in in Shonan's half.
Kawasaki pushes forward through Hokuto Shimoda, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Shonan in their own half.
Can Kawasaki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
Kawasaki drives forward and Leandro Damiao gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 75, Masaaki Iemoto awards the home team a throw-in.
Kaoru Mitoma is on target to give Kawasaki a 2-1 advantage.
The away team replace Mitsuki Saito with Sosuke Shibata.
In the minute 81, Throw-in high up the field for Kawasaki in Kawasaki.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kawasaki.
Shonan have a dangerous throw-in.
Masaaki Iemoto signals a throw-in for Shonan, close to Kawasaki's area.
In the minute 85, Ao Tanaka is replacing Hokuto Shimoda for the home team.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in their own half.
In the minute 87, Shonan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's now 3-1 in Kawasaki as Ao Tanaka scores for Kawasaki.
Kawasaki to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Shonan at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Goal kick for Shonan at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Kawasaki.
Masaaki Iemoto awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Shonan.
Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
Masaaki Iemoto blows to end the match. The final score is 3-1.
